DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the short-term (8 week) mean 24-hour intraocular pressure control and safety of TravTim fixed combination given once in the evening with placebo once in the morning versus TravTim given once in the morning with placebo once in the evening in patients with open-angle glaucoma.
DOC.brief_title: 24-Hour Intraocular Pressure (IOP) Control With Travoprost/Timolol Fixed Combination
